text: * Ductus deferens (vas deferens) ~ 45 cm long — Passes through inguinal canal to pelvic cavity — Expands to form ampulla — Joins duct of seminal vesicle to form ejaculatory duct « Smooth muscle in walls propels sperm from epididymis to urethra » Vasectomy: cutting and ligating ductus deferens — Nearly 100% effective form of birth control
